diff.author: Darius Jazayeri
diff.description: Create htmlform table, for storing html form templates
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `htmlformentry_html_form` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `form_id` int(11), `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `xml_data` mediumtext NOT NULL, `creator` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `date_created` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `changed_by` int(11) default NULL, `date_changed` datetime default NULL, `retired` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `User who created htmlformentry_htmlform` (`creator`), KEY `Form with which this htmlform is related` (`form_id`), KEY `User who changed htmlformentry_htmlform` (`changed_by`), CONSTRAINT `User who created htmlformentry_htmlform` FOREIGN KEY (`creator`) REFERENCES `users` (`user_id`), CONSTRAINT `Form with which this htmlform is related` FOREIGN KEY (`form_id`) REFERENCES `form` (`form_id`), CONSTRAINT `User who changed htmlformentry_htmlform` FOREIGN KEY (`changed_by`) REFERENCES `users` (`user_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

diff.author: Mark Goodrich
diff.description: Update htmlform table to contain all standard Openmrs metadata fields
